content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE SILVER.VENDAS_ITENS (
	[NUM_VENDA] int,
	[NUM_SEQ] int,
	[ID_PROD] int,
	[QTDE] numeric(10,2),
	[VAL_UNIT] numeric(10,2),
	[VAL_TOTAL] numeric(10,2)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'bronze/vendas_itens/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [treinamento_adlstrnsolar99_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFormat]
	)
GO
